abstract: Scores of companies, lawmakers and other parties have weighed in on AT&T’s proposed deal for T-Mobile. Here’s what some had to say about the Justice Department’s effort to block the deal.
snippet: Scores of companies, lawmakers and other parties have weighed in on AT&T’s proposed deal for T-Mobile. Here’s what some had to say about the Justice Department’s effort to block the deal.
lead_paragraph: As the biggest telecom deal in years, one that could reshape the American wireless landscape, AT&T‘s $39 billion purchase of T-Mobile USA drew scores of supporters and critics alike.

headline.main: Reacting to Justice’s Suit Against AT&T

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
